message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $11000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $12500. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. After considering your offer, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12800. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
